articles.title: Bitcoin and Ether Prices Stagnate as Traders Take Wait-and-See Approach
articles.description: The March 12 crash is still fresh in crypto traders’ and fund managers’ minds, leaving some to think no trading decisions are the best decisions for now.
articles.content:
After staging a recovery earlier this week, cryptocurrencies were stuck in a holding pattern Friday afternoon.
